title: Full-Atom Peptide Design with Geometric Latent Diffusion
authors: Xiangzhe Kong, Yinjun Jia, Wenbing Huang, Yang Liu
abstract: This study proposes a full-atom peptide design method based on a geometric latent diffusion model, which shows great potential in drug development. By addressing the challenges of full-atom geometry and binding site geometry, the proposed model significantly improves diversity and binding affinity.
